entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Agassiz 6:00 PM PST Sunday 26 February 2023

Humidity: 93 %

Wind: W 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries early this evening. A few flurries beginning early this evening and ending overnight. Clearing before morning. Risk of hail early this evening. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or wet flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 40 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Sunday 26 February 2023
